    Resume | Khaled A. Shabaik

    Khaled A. Shabaik

    Senior QA Engineer

    Professional Summary

    Software QA Engineer with over 8 years of experience in delivering high-quality Web, Mobile, and API solutions across diverse domains including Stock Brokerage and Trading Services, and currently focusing on Blockchain and DeFi systems.

    Contact Me

    Email: khaled.ashraf.tech@gmail.com

    High-level Responsibilities

    • Fostering customer satisfaction and building lasting relationships.
    • Establishing QA best practices and monitoring processes.
    • Release management and shipping services.
    • Optimizing test coverage through AI technologies and scalable test automation frameworks.

    Skills

    • QA & Testing Skills: Functional, Regression, Integration, System, End-to-End (E2E), User Acceptance Testing (UAT).
    • Automation Frameworks: Selenium, Playwright, Rest Assured, Postman, Appium, TestNG, Jest, Cucumber.
    • Tools: Jira, TestRail, ClickUp, Git, GitHub Actions, Jenkins.
    • AI Testing tools: AI Test Case Generator.
    • Programming/Scripting Languages: Java, JavaScript, SQL.
    • Industry Specific: Blockchain, Decentralized finance (DeFi), Trading Systems and payment gateways.
    • Interpersonal Skills: Presentation skills, Solution demonstrations, Effective communications.

    Work Experience

    POSITION: SENIOR QA TESTER   |   COMPANY: LA3EB   |   AUG 2021 - PRESENT

    LA3EB is a gaming community and e-commerce platform. I collaborated with the team to develop new features from the ground up, for both web and mobile applications, across three primary business models.

    Testing:
    Web, mobile apps, and APIs, system testing, function testing, regression testing, cross-platform testing, event tracking testing.

    Tools:
    ClickUp, Postman, Java, Selenium, Appium, Cucumber, gitlab, Browserstack.

    Job Responsibilities:

    • Performed cross-platform testing to identify code deficiencies.
    • Collaborated with Product Owners and Development Teams in requirement analysis, acceptance criteria agreement, impact assessment, and change requests coordination.
    • Conducted root cause investigations, engaged in practical reproduction of defects across UI and API, and prioritised critical issues.
    • Release Management: Conducted User Acceptance Testing (UAT), while overseeing production releases, validating stability after backend changes, and implementing rollback procedures if necessary.

    Achievements & Outcomes:

    • Coordinated internal and outsourced teams to deliver a new gaming module that increased app downloads and boosted traffic to the shopping module.
    • Improved app performance by identifying defect clusters and monitoring API errors including, but not limited to, the product landing page and filtration screen, reducing request failures and improving reliability.
    • Maintained Selenium automation scripts, enhancing test coverage and reporting accuracy across major web functionalities. Also automated scenarios on the mobile app using Appium.
